titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: ELIGIBLE POPULATION IMMUNISED PERCENTAGE (COVER HEPATITIS B SURFACE ANTIGEN POSITIVE MOTHER) - Description

body.p: ELIGIBLE POPULATION IMMUNISED PERCENTAGE (COVER HEPATITIS B SURFACE ANTIGEN POSITIVE MOTHER) is the percentage of the ELIGIBLE POPULATION TOTAL (COVER HEPATITIS B SURFACE ANTIGEN POSITIVE MOTHER) Â immunised as part of an Immunisation Programme .
